title: Huge lag problem but internet speed is normal

embed.description: MacOS: open a Finder window, press âŒ˜-Shift-G, and paste in /Applications/League of Legends.app/Contents/LOL/Logs/Network Logs

body: Hello guys, I have recently been having some horrid lag problems making my games unplayable.  I used some internet tests and everything said my internet connection & speed was good, but when I play a league game, my ping has no limitations ranging from 40 - 15000 m/s.  I have tried restarting my pc multiple times, I have no other applications running at the same time as league, but no matter what I do my ping constantly spikes back and forth in-game.  I played a custom game and my ping stayed around 50 ms and spiked to 150 a few times so I tried to play a normals game, then my ping flew back to a constant 6000 as seen on the link.  If anyone has any idea of how to fix this please help me, I can't seem to do anything anymore.

replies.body:
Your linked LogsOfLag test shows some nasty latency (ping) spikes over the period of time the test ran. I suspect we'd see similar spikes along your route to our servers if tested. Before we run those tests, I recommend running through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local settings are good.

If you still see these issues after taking those steps, let me know.

I've been having a similar problem except my ping doesn't spike.

This has been happening since Dec 29th around 6:00pm Mtn time. I was using the new alpha client, and while playing my ranked games, the game would suddenly start being unresponsive or disconnect me. My internet is running fine and I have 36 ping with a capped 144 fps. Nothing spikes. I am unable to use skills, I can hardly move and it acts like I'm lagging, but like I said, my ping doesn't spike.
I switched back to the legacy client and everything was fine until today, Dec 30th around 5:30pm mtn time. The exact same thing kept happening and I was getting booted from my game constantly. When I try to log back in using either the legacy or the alpha client, the client freezes at "Authenticating" or "Logging in". Something is severely wrong right now.

I uninstalled league and reinstalled it.  Hoping that it may fix the issue, but I'll have to wait and see
